item.description: About me I am a PhD candidate from the University of Lausanne.

item.title: Research
item.description: Working Paper Risk and Rationality: The Relative Importance of Probability Weighting and Choice Set Dependence (with Adrian Bruhin and Luis Santos-Pinto) Work in progress Unemployment Insurance Duration and Subjective Health (with Rafael Lalive) Schooling Choices and Labor Market Outcomes Book Chapter Lalive, Rafael, Maha Manai, and Alois Stutzer. “Gender Differences in Well-Being and Equal Rights.” Encyclopedia of Quality of Life and Well-Being Research.

item.title: Teaching
item.description: Guest Lecturer Microeconomics (Spring 2014-2016) Public Finance (Fall 2016 and Fall 2018) Teaching assistant Microeconomics (Spring 2014-2019) Public Finance (Fall 2016-2018) Statistics and Econometrics (Fall 2017) Applied Econometrics (Spring 2014) Empirical Methods (Spring 2013)
